Uses of Interface
org.springframework.expression.OperatorOverloader

  • Packages that use OperatorOverloader 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.expression
    Core abstractions behind the Spring Expression Language.
    org.springframework.expression.spel.support
    SpEL's default implementations for various core abstractions.

    • Uses of OperatorOverloader in org.springframework.expression

      Methods in org.springframework.expression that return OperatorOverloader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OperatorOverloader EvaluationContext.getOperatorOverloader()
      Return an operator overloader that may support mathematical operations between more than the standard set of types.
